thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 6 of 178
thread.title: Ali

author: Ali
title: Ali
text:
This was my first time of using TrustedHousesitters and was slightly nervous about taking the step of having strangers to come and stay in our home to look after our pets. I need not have worried, through TrustedHousesitters we found a lovely couple of ladies who stayed in our home for 2 weeks. They were organised, friendly, enthusiastic and kept in touch with us throughout their stay, sending us photos of the happy pets.
I can recommend TrustedHousesiters and intend to use them again.
